SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am13
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am13.model.card.points

Interface PointsPlayable

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
PointsCorner, PointsInstant, PointsResource
public interface PointsPlayable extends Serializable
Representation of the points of a playable card. It contains information about how to calculate the points, and allows to actually calculate them given a field and a card side playable. Following the game rules, it should be used to calculate points when a player plays a card side.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    calcPoints(CardSidePlayableIF cardSidePlayable, FieldIF field)
    Calculate points of the card, according to information present in class that implements this interface.
    int
    getPointsMultiplier()
    Return the points multiplier.
    Resource
    getPointsResource()
    Return the required resource to get points by playing the card.
    boolean
    isCornerTypePoints()
    Returns true if the number of points is conditioned to the number of angles the card covers.

  • Method Details

    • calcPoints

      int calcPoints(CardSidePlayableIF cardSidePlayable, FieldIF field)
      Calculate points of the card, according to information present in class that implements this interface.
      Parameters:
      cardSidePlayable - side of the playable card that gives these points to the player
      field - Field of the player for whom you want to calculate the points given by the card objective.
      Returns:
      number of points the player gets after playing the card side

    • getPointsMultiplier

      int getPointsMultiplier()
      Return the points multiplier. In other words, the number of points which appears on the card.
      Returns:
      Points multiplier

    • getPointsResource

      Resource getPointsResource()
      Return the required resource to get points by playing the card.
      Returns:
      Resource required

    • isCornerTypePoints

      boolean isCornerTypePoints()
      Returns true if the number of points is conditioned to the number of angles the card covers.
      Returns:
      true if PointsCorner, false otherwise
